description.text: ENTERTAINER'S DELIGHT Come check out this updated 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom residence with approximately 1, 670 sq ft of living space which offers an updated kitchen, with newer appliances, updated bathrooms, newer carpet, and laminate flooring throughout. Living room is ready for movie night with a projector wall and hooks-ups ready for your own projector. You will be impressed with the hallway bathroom that boast a surround tile shower, modern rain shower system and built-in Bluetooth speaker. Wait to you see the hidden gem in the backyard created for entertaining!!! It features a pool table and dart board under the covered patio, patio shading that extends to the rear of the property, artificial grass, a performance stage/alleviated decking, and patio lighting throughout. This home is also equipped with energy efficient features like double-pane windows, artificial grass both in the front and backyard and SOLAR PANELS for added savings! Laundry hook-ups are conveniently located in the garage area with extra storage rack and a storage room. The front of the property is fenced and gated and offers additional drive-way parking. This home is conveniently located near schools, shopping, restaurants, the 71, 60 and 10 freeways. All appliances are included, making it hassle-free to move in. Must see to appreciate!

disclaimer.text: © 2023, California Regional Multiple Listing Service, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

description.text: ROOM FOR RENT. Welcome to your new home! We have a fantastic opportunity for a student female, nurse student, or working adult female who is looking for a serene and peaceful living space. Our downstairs room, which can be best described as a cozy studio, offers everything you need for comfortable living. As you enter through the door connected to the kitchen, you'll immediately feel a sense of warmth and belonging. The sliding door provides easy access to our beautiful backyard, perfect for enjoying some fresh air or spending peaceful moments in nature. In addition, you'll have the luxury of your own private bathroom with a shower, ensuring convenience and privacy. You'll also have full access to our laundry room, making chores a breeze, and the garage storage, providing ample space for your belongings. The room itself features a lovely fireplace, adding a touch of charm and coziness. With its laminate flooring and white walls, it offers a modern and clean aesthetic. Our home is located in the tranquil Phillips Ranch area, nestled between the picturesque Chino Hills and Diamond. The location is incredibly convenient, with everything you need just a stone's throw away. Whether it's shopping centers, recreational activities, or educational institutions, you'll find them all within easy reach. The area is known for its beauty and tranquility, creating the perfect environment for unwinding and relaxation. We take pride in maintaining a peaceful and quiet atmosphere in our home. Currently, there are only two residents, along with two cats and one puppy. So you can rest assured that you'll have the tranquility you need for studying and unwinding after a long day. It's important to note that our home is Christian based, and we are looking for a like-minded individual who shares our beliefs. If you're seeking a welcoming and serene living space in a prime location, this room is perfect for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to become a part of our close-knit community. Contact us today to arrange a visit and see for yourself the wonderful home we have to offer. Welcome to your new chapter of peaceful living!

disclaimer.text: © 2023, California Regional Multiple Listing Service, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

description.text: Welcome home to 60 Town and Country Rd located in Phillips ranch. This 2nd and 3rd story Town house features 2 oversized bedrooms with loft option on 3rd floor that can be used as a bedroom. With washer and dryer included and 2 assigned parking spaces, this open floor plan will leave you looking no further. Water, trash, Sewer, Gardener HOA are included. Just pay electric.

Very clean, private upstairs unit offers spacious rooms, newly painted interior, tile floors in living room, kitchen and dining area, new luxury vinyl plank flooring and window air conditioners in both bedrooms. Garage included. Close to shopping and transportation. Apply at TurboTenant: Property Id 1210784

- (RLNE7861215) Spacious UPDATED 3 bedroom, 1 bath family home with security fenced yard behind a tall, locking entry gate. - Spacious UPDATED 3 bedroom, 1 bath family home with security fenced yard behind a tall, locking entry gate. Large, private, protected area to park your camper and personal vehicle. Approximately 1/4-acre lot with grass and plantings out front and a completely paved back yard. Low maintenance paved area drains well, no mud, no weeds. Additional parking and storage in the oversized detached two-car garage which has a new roof and new locking garage doors. Located in UNINCORPORATED SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY Zoned IC (Community-Industrial). No business signage out front allowed. The home is renovated with new plumbing, gas lines, electrical, drywall, paint, doors, and water heater. There is an enclosed outdoor area off the back door for a family pet. Tenants shall be responsible for all lawn care/gardening and all utilities. Small pets allowed. No smoking. To schedule an appointment please visit our website at AVAILABILITY DATE: NOW FLOORING: Laminate GARAGE: 2 + Car Detached Garage (Oversized APPLIANCES INCLUDED: None (There are laundry hookups and a hot water heater). AC/HEATING: Wall heater PROPERTY TYPE: Single Family House with paved yard. ALL UTILITIES and yard maintenance (gardener) ARE PAID BY TENANT YARD: Front, Back & Side PET RESTRICTIONS: No Pit Bulls, Rottweilers, Husky, or dogs of 20 lbs. or more. Pet Deposits are Required for each Pet and Pet Rent is $25 per month for each. SMOKING: NO SMOKING INSIDE THE PREMISES MOVE-IN FEES: $3, 199.00 First-month rent $3, 199.00 Security Deposit $50.00 Lease Preparation Fee $600.00 Pet Deposit (per pet) upon approval. $25.00 Pet Rent (per pet) upon approval $120.00 Landscaping (paid by tenant) ADDITIONAL FEES NOT INCLUDED IN RENT: (Hold fees, Risk Mitigation Fee, Lease Admin Fee, Etc.) SHOWING: Book schedule at APPLICATION: After viewing the property, go to to apply APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS: Before you begin: If you have ever been evicted, do not apply, and call our office. We do not rent to owners of Pit Bulls or other breeds deemed dangerous. If your credit score is under 650 do not apply. We do not issue refunds for CREDIT, so please read all the requirements before applying. Please be prepared to pay the application fee as outlined in the property listing. In addition to this rental application, you will also be required to provide a copy of a valid form of identification and proof of income(3 most recent pay stubs). To complete this rental application, you must be prepared to provide 3 years of residential history as well as contact information for your rental references. You will also be asked to provide information on your monthly income, and please note that most properties require that the applicant(s)' combined gross income is at least three (3) times the monthly rent amount. Each resident over the age of 18 must submit a separate rental application. Application fee: $45.00/applicant LEASE DURATION: 1 year PETSCREENING IS A REQUIRED PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS FOR ALL APPLICANTS: A welcoming environment is paramount to all of our residents with or without pets as well as animals. To help ensure ALL of our residents understand our pet and animal-related policies, we use a third-party screening service and require EVERYONE to complete a profile. This process ensures we have formalized pet and animal-related policy acknowledgments and more accurate records to create greater mutual accountability. If you need accommodation in another way, please contact your housing provider. Please get started by selecting a profile category on our landing page: All information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed and is subject to change.

- (RLNE6016964) 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bath Gated Townhome Community with Water & Trash Included in Pomona - Cozy 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bath, 1, 224 sq. ft. townhome located in gated community complex in Pomona. Family room, kitchen and bathrooms covered in large ceramic tiles for easy maintenance. All bedrooms are upstairs in carpet, with a powder room downstairs. Master bedroom includes walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Private backyard, and 2-Car attached garage with laundry hookup. Rent Include Water, Trash and HOA dues. Conveniently located close to schools, parks, minutes away from Pomona Amtrak, library, city hall, court house, police station, banks, churches and downtown Pomona. Commuter friendly with quick access to 10, 60, 71 and 57 freeways. No pets allowed, except ADA defined service animal. Please see property via video tour and apply directly on our website if you are interested. No Pets Allowed

This apartment features a living room, a dining area with breakfast bar, and a galley kitchen with excellent cabinet and counter space. There is carpeted flooring throughout the majority of the space, with tiled flooring in the kitchen and bathroom. The home also features spacious closets, a wood burning fireplace, air-conditioning, an in-unit washer and dryer, and a private porch space with extra storage closet. Community amenities include a well-equipped fitness center, three swimming pools, a gorgeously landscaped picnic area with barbecue grills, a business center, package acceptance services, and complimentary wifi in common areas. Pets are welcome. Covered parking options are available. This apartment is conveniently located near fitness and jogging trails and is a five minute drive from Interstate 10. Availability and pricing is real-time and can change daily and vary by lease term PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING. ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.

- (RLNE4449457) Beautiful 2 bed 2.5 bath townhome - Newly renovated, beautiful townhouse in a quiet gated community. 2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms and 2 living/family rooms (upstairs and downstairs). Large master bedroom with spacious closet. Private backyard patio. Attached two car garage. Guest parking adjacent to house. Move in special $300 off move in fees. OPEN HOUSE: Sunday 7/9/2023 Time: 10:00 AM- 12:00 PM

Welcome to 777 Place Apartments. Our beautiful community is centrally located near shopping, dining, recreation, freeways and entertainment. We offer eleven beatifully designed spacious floorplans to accommodate everyone needs. Our apartment homes feature modern kitchens with electric appliances, garbage disposal and dishwasher, plenty of windows, large closets, additional storage space and are pre-wired for phone, cable and internet service. Surrounded by tropical landscaping, sun light and wonderful views, you will find unlimited possibilities to reflect your lifestyle. Relax and make friends out of neighbors around the refreshing pool and spa or come to our State of the Art Fitness Center after a long day at work or school. The search is over. Our friendly staff is waiting to give you a personalized tour. Stop By Today, Discover What You Are Missing And Make 777 Place Apartments Your New Home. Gated Community, On-Site Management, On-Site Maintenance, Availability 24-Hours, Night Patrol, Elevator, Garage, Laundry Facilities, High-Speed Internet, Business Center, Public Transportation, Fitness Center, Pool & Pets Allowed.

description.name: Stoneridge Management Partners, Inc.
description.text: (909) 358-2098 - (RLNE5269129) 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment home - Come and take a look at this spacious 2 bed 1 bath apartment in a 4-unit complex in Pomona. This unit is upstairs and offers an open kitchen and dining area with new paint, remodeled bathroom, and tile flooring throughout. Move in ready. No Pets Allowed

description.text: Beautiful Home in the new community of The Crossing in Phillips Ranch. Spacious grand room with open floor design. Great kitchen with island and dining area facing the patio. The upstairs bedrooms are roomy with window shutters throughout. Master bedroom boasts a large master bath and large walk in closet. Upstairs laundry room for convenience. Nice neutral colors through out. Tenants to pay all utilities. Please provide application, credit report and proof of income. Please no pets or smokers. Total move in $9000 (First month rent + Security Deposit). Open House, Saturday, June 17 from 10:00am-12:00pm

disclaimer.text: © 2023, California Regional Multiple Listing Service, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

description.text: Nicely upgraded 2nd story Phillips Ranch condo. Great location in a well maintained complex. 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Lots of natural light. Gas fireplace. Vaulted ceilings. Upgrades include: Dual pane slider in master, Wood laminate flooring, Fresh paint and Upgraded kitchen. Professionally cleaned and ready for move in. 1 reserved garage space (#294) in a shared 2 car garage and 1 unreserved parking space in common area parking area. Lots of guest parking throughout complex. Association amenities include pool, spa and tot lot playground. Unit is close to secluded hot tub. Sorry, no pets allowed.

description.text: 2 Bedrooms, 1 1/2 Bathrooms, located on the second floor of Four Plex, close to freeway 71 and Freeway 60. Located close to Cal Poly University, Mount Sac College

description.text: Phone Extension:114 - (909) 236-5401 - (RLNE8094327) Luxurious NEW BUILT in Pomona with Golf views - Beautiful back duplex features 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. New gorgeous laminate floors and marble tile flooring in the entryway and bathroom. Recessed lighting throughout with ceiling fan in living space. Open floor plan kitchen, dining, and living room area. Large windows. New bathroom with gorgeous marble tile flooring and black hardware. Big walk-in closets in both bedrooms. Huge yard with citrus trees perfect for BBQs and within walking distance of parks and restaurants. Section 8 Welcome with credit approval. SHOWING: Book schedule at www.renthmr.com APPLICATION: After viewing the property, go to www.renthmr.com to apply APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS: Before you begin: If you have ever been evicted, do not apply, and call our office. We do not rent to owners of Pit Bulls or other breeds deemed dangerous. If your credit score is under 650 do not apply. We do not issue refunds for CREDIT, so please read all the requirements before applying. Please be prepared to pay the application fee as outlined in the property listing. In addition to this rental application, you will also be required to provide a copy of a valid form of identification and proof of income(3 most recent pay stubs). To complete this rental application, you must be prepared to provide 3 years of residential history as well as contact information for your rental references. You will also be asked to provide information on your monthly income, and please note that most properties require that the applicant(s)' combined gross income is at least three (3) times the monthly rent amount. Each resident over the age of 18 must submit a separate rental application. Application fee: $45.00/applicant LEASE DURATION: 1 year PETSCREENING IS A REQUIRED PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS FOR ALL APPLICANTS: A welcoming environment is paramount to all of our residents with or without pets as well as animals. To help ensure ALL of our residents understand our pet and animal-related policies, we use a third-party screening service and require EVERYONE to complete a profile. This process ensures we have formalized pet and animal-related policy acknowledgments and more accurate records to create greater mutual accountability. If you need accommodation in another way, please contact your housing provider. Please get started by selecting a profile category on our landing page: https://renthmr.petscreening.com *All information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed and is subject to change.*

description.text: Fabulous lease in one of Phillips Ranch's newest subdivisions! Wonderful floor plan with one bedroom down and 3 up, plus a master retreat with fireplace- this makes a great office or nursery too. Brand New interior and exterior paint, new hood and range, new patio, new faucets and toilets, clearance termite control, new roof and new door locks and handles. Decent conditions in and out, with a private yard, covered patio, sprinkler system, garden, koi pond...The interior has hardwood flooring, vaulted ceilings in the living room and master bedroom, fireplace in the family room, spacious kitchen nook for informal meals, plus a formal dining room with beautiful doors to the back yard. So much more.....

description.name: Accommodate Real Estate
description.text: (626) 714-2810 - (RLNE8013626) Introducing an exceptional 3 bedroom 2 Bath house in the highly sought-after city of Pomona! - This stunning property features an open floor plan with an abundance of natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere throughout. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances and plenty of cabinet space, perfect for all your culinary needs. All three bedrooms are generously sized and feature ample closet space, providing plenty of storage. The house also features two bathrooms that are tastefully updated with new fixtures and finishes. Enjoy relaxing or entertaining in the large backyard, which is perfect for barbeques or outdoor gatherings. Parking is available in the front. Located just minutes from Pomona's vibrant downtown area, this house is conveniently situated near a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Commuting is a breeze, with easy access to major highways and public transportation. This is an exceptional opportunity to live in a spacious and comfortable home in a highly desirable location. Don't miss your chance to make this house your new home! More Photos to Come....

description.text: Newly renovated 2 bedrooms 1 bathroom home in an established neighborhood surrounded by rolling hills. This spacious home with onsite laundry comes with new kitchen, flooring, bathroom, parking, backyard and many other bells and whistle. It's also located less than 3 miles to Cal Poly Pomona and Western University. Utilities are included. Are you ready? Let's get moving.

advertisers.slogan: The Simple Recipe To Your Happy Home
advertisers.name: May Phan

description.name: eaves Phillips Ranch
description.text: Located on Appian Way, eaves Phillips Ranch is conveniently located within easy access of the 10, 60, 57 and 71 freeways, along with nearby access to the Metrolink line. Pomona is situated in the heart of Los Angeles County, located 30 miles east of Los Angeles. eaves Phillips Ranch offers residents a range of amenities including outdoor swimming pools, fitness center, BBQ/grill areas and an on-site business center. Apartment homes also feature wood burning fireplaces and in-unit washers and dryers.

description.name: Meridian at Phillips Ranch
description.text: Welcome to an unparalleled luxury living experience at Meridian at Phillips Ranch. Relax in our resort-style pool and spa, hosting friends and family in our club house or at our outdoor BBQ dining areas. We are conveniently located in the southwestern portion of the city limits of Pomona, in Los Angeles County, California next to the Pomona Freeway (SR 60), the Orange Freeway (SR 57), and the Chino Valley Freeway (SR 71). Enjoy shopping, entertainment and restaurants just minutes away in downtown Pomona or The Shoppes at Chino Hills. Catch the newest film at Harkins Theater, shop at Banana Republic, J. Crew, New Your & Co., and eat at The Yard House, Pacific Fish Grill or P.F.Changs. Meridian at Phillips Ranch Townhomes is the perfect place to live!

disclaimer.text: © 2023, California Regional Multiple Listing Service, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

description.text: A beautiful Home in the front of the green belt public park, the house features elegant kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, quaint wood floors, upgraded kitchen appliances, well-designed wall decorations, and fully upgraded bathrooms. Each of the 2 guest bedrooms has balconies with beautiful views over the public park where the meandering walking paths are naturally extending themselves into the rolling greens and the woods in the distance. Within a 10-minute drive are Walmart supermarket, Diamond Ranch High School, and the neighborhood shopping plaza. Within 15 minute drive, you may find yourselves in one of the largest shopping plazas in the region, Puente Hills Mall. Close to one of the best elementary schools and high schools in the area. Mt SAC college and CalPoly are all not too far from the house.

description.text: Actual furnishings/decor may differ due to product changes and enhancements Utilities are pre-set up however tenant pays what they use This is a furnished rental Pricing reflects four (4) months or longer lease term. Shorter lease terms are available starting at thirty days (30), however, the price will be subject to change Experience the natural tranquility of this beautiful 4 bedroom 3 bathroom home in the rolling hills of Phillips Ranch. Premier location in the magnificent Mission Hills Estates. Newly installed natural wood flooring and a large modern kitchen give the home an elegant and stylish feel. Conveniently located 1 bedroom (or office) downstairs and 3 Bedrooms upstairs. This is private and peaceful, with a pool / spa that features a rock waterfall. A real entertaining backyard with lush foliage, patio for barbecues and the refreshing outside living that Californians enjoy all year. The kitchen features granite counters, center island, stainless commercial grade appliances, refrigerator and wine cooler. The master suite is impressively oversized with vaulted ceilings, a fireplace, and a private covered balcony to soak in the lush backyard landscape & pool. An exquisite home in a prime location in Pomona. Guest Access - Amazing neighborhood in Pomona - 4 bedrooms, 3bathrooms - Washer and dryer - Attached 2 car garage Location Walking distance to several parks and the Pomona Trail, and only a 10 minute drive to Bonelli Park and Puddingstone Lake - this spot is an outdoor-lovers dream! The community has resort-style amenities and award winning Schools in North Diamond Bar: Ranch Hills Elementary, Lorber Jr. High, and Diamond Ranch High School. The home is close to the 10, 57, and 60 freeways, giving you quick access to the greater area. Shopping, entertainment, and dining options are at your fingertips, including local nearby restaurant favorites Mariscos El Ostion, Ardaya's Restaurant, and The Rookery Alehouse & Grill.

description.name: Don Properties 03 LLC
description.text: (909) 969-7260 - (RLNE3435016) Large Studio, Great Community, Resident-Only Pool - Beautifully maintained building, large pool. On-site manager and peaceful community. Great opportunity for the perfect renter, well located to stores and freeway. On-site parking and laundry. No pets. Schedule a tour today with our manager Orelia at 909 236 2213. 1bd/1ba units may also be available, please inquire with manager. *Photos may be of a similarly finished unit. Please call to arrange a tour before submitting an application. *Please note that we perform a background check on all of our applicants. *We require a minimum household income of 2.5x the monthly rent. (Ex. $950 rent requires $2,375 monthly household income) *Co-signers are not accepted No Pets Allowed

description.name: Twin Palms
description.text: Now offering 3D virtual tours - Click Here Twin Palms is a hidden gem with great location close to major freeways for commuters heading towards the LA and Orange Counties. Our upgraded studios display class and comfort alike. We offer a variety in studio and one bedroom floor plans that cater to any lifestyle. We take pride in maintaining our quiet, well-kept and comfortable community where everyone knows each other and exudes neighborly values. Twin Palms Apartments is a true community, and a place for everyone to call home.

description.text: Actual furnishings/decor may differ due to product changes and enhancements Utilities are pre-set up however tenant pays what they use This is a furnished rental Escape to a world of luxury and relaxation in this fully furnished home in the highly desirable Phillips Ranch area. As you step through the grand double-door entry, you'll be greeted by high ceilings, inviting natural light, and a splendid open living room complete with cathedral ceilings and recessed lighting. The separate family room with a cozy fireplace is the perfect place to unwind. Take in the breathtaking views of the backyard and pool/spa while you cook and entertain in the kitchen or relax in the family room. The formal dining room is your go-to for hosting dinner parties and gathering with loved ones, complete with elegant recessed lighting. Step outside to the spacious backyard, where you'll find freshly painted wood patio covers, a built-in barbecue island, and views of the rock pool/spa combo that will transport you to a permanent vacation. The backyard is perfect for hosting gatherings, entertaining, and creating lasting memories with family and friends. Experience the luxury of living in this Phillips Ranch home. Guest Access Amazing neighborhood in Pomona Spacious 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms Washer and dryer Attached 3 car garage Location This stunning home is in the heart of Phillips Ranch in Pomona, California. The community offers various recreational activities, from parks and playgrounds to sports fields, shopping and dining options, and award-winning schools. This is an ideal location for those looking to experience the best of California's suburban living while still being close to the excitement and opportunities of the city - the perfect place to call home during your stay.

description.text: Absolutely Gorgeous AWARD winning Townhome located in beautiful Pomona! Builders received a construction award and a Congressional Recognition award in 2022 for this beautiful project. You will admire the open floor plan with beautiful laminate flooring as you enter this luxurious home. Lots of windows to bring in natural lighting. One bedroom downstairs for guests or mother-in-law quarters with sliding closet doors. Entertain guests in the open-concept family room and Kitchen area. Custom white kitchen cabinets complimented with gorgeous white quartz countertops. Upgraded stainless steel appliances will be provided in Unit 1 only. Enjoy a large walk-in pantry. The Stairway is covered with upgraded neutral carpet through the hallway and portions of the second floor, including all bedrooms. Located upstairs, you will find a large loft that can easily be used as a bedroom, Playroom, or Home Office. The grand Master bedroom leads to a cozy balcony area to relax and enjoy coffee. The third bedroom is spacious, with sliding closet doors. A large enclosed laundry room is conveniently located on the second floor. The enclosed two-car garage leads directly into the home. Solar panels are built into each location to alleviate electrical cost. Water and Trash are included. These beautiful townhomes are located across from Alcott Elementary school and minutes from Costco and Sam's Club and 20 minutes from Ontario International Airport, Kaiser Hospital, various restaurants, breweries, and Cal Poly Pomona. AcroYou will not find a better, newly constructed home in the area. Please see the virtual tour for additional information.
